Translations.Text: Hariho Abamarayika bangahe mw’ijuru, ubusabizi bwabo butazo fasha atari munyuma yaho Imana izotanga uruhusha kuwo yishakiye nuku mwemerera
Mu vy’ukuri bamwe batemera umusi w’imperukara bahamagara Abamarayika ku mazina y’abakenyezi
Nabo ntabumenyi bafise kuri ivyo, kuko bada kurikiza atari ukwikekeranya gusa, mu vy’ukuri ukwikeka ntigufasha ikintu na kimwe imbere y’ukuri
Rero ni wirinde na bamwe baha ibitugu vyabo iki cibutso cacu kandi ntibashaka atari ubuzima bwo ngaha kw’Isi gusa
Aya niyo maherezo yabo mu kumenya kwabo, mu vy’ukuri Umuremyi wawe niwe afise ubumenyi bw’umuntu yazimiye munzira yiwe kandi niyo ifise n’ubumenyi bw’uwarokotse
Ni vy’Imana ibiri mumajuru hamwe n’ibiri kw’Isi kugira ngo ibahembe abantu babi kumabi yabo yose bagira, n’uguhemba ineza kubantu bagira ineza

Abatitaho ku bicumuro bikuru bikuru hamwe n’ibikorwa vy’umwanda, dukuye mwo amakosa mato mato, ntankeka Umuremyi wawe niwe nyene ikigongwe cinshi, kandi niyo ibazi cane kuva akibarema kuri iy’Isi, no kuva mukiri imbanyi z’abavyeyi banyu, rero ntimusukure imitima yanyu, kuko niyo ifise ubumenyi buhagije bw’uwisukuye
Mbega wabonye umwe yahindukira
Akaba yatanze bikeyi n’uguca yigumya
Mbega arafise ubumenyi bw’ibitaboneka n’ukubibona
Canke ntiyabwiwe ibiri mu bitabu vy’’intumwa y’Imana Mussa (iii)
Hamwe n’ibitabu vy’intumwa y’Imana Ibrahimu (iii) yakwijije indagano y’Imana
Yuko itakira umutima w’ibicumuro vy’uwundi mutima
N’umuntu ntazoronka icarico cose atari kukintu yakoze
N’ibikorwa vyiwe yagize bizo bonekana
Hanyuma azohembwa impembo yiwe ikwiye
Impera n’imperuka n’ugusubira k’Umuremyi wawe
Nayo Imana niyo izana ibintu binezereza n’ibitera agahinda
Kandi niyo yica n’ukuzura
Kandi niyo yaremye ibintu bibiri ikigabo n’ikigore mubintu vyose
Mu mbuto z’uruvyaro mugihe zisukiwe mugitereko c’uruvyaro
Kandi n’uko hejuru yayo hariho irindi zurwa ry’abantu
Kandi kuriyo niyo itanga ibikwiye ni vy’umusesekara
Kandi niwe Muremyi w’Inyenyeri yitiriwe Shi’ira
Kandi niyo yahoneje Aadi wambere
NaThamuda ntihasigaje n’umwe
N’imbere	y’abo	abantu	bo	kuntumwa	y’Imana	Nuhu	(iii)	nabone barahemukiye imitima yabo gusumba ayandi mabi cane
N’ibisagara vyacuranguwe ikaba ariyo yabi curanguye
Irabipfuka ivyapfutswe
N’iyihe migisha y’Umuremyi wawe uyigirira ko amakenga
Uyu n’uwutuza mubatuza bakera
Icaduka kiri hafi kiregereje
Ntawushobora kugikura ho atari Imana yonyene
Mbega mutangazwa n’ibi biganiro
N’ugutwenga, kandi mutarira
Murasamaye gusa
Rero nimu pfukamire Imana kandi muyisenge
Umwanya wageze, n’Ukwezi kwamanyutse
Nibabona igitangaro baca bahindukira k’urundi ruhande n’ukuvuga bati:- ubu n’uburozi bwiwe buguma bubandanya
Barahakanye ibi vyose baca bakurikira ivyo imitima yabo yipfuza, n’ibintu vyose vy’Imana n’ibibaho
Mu vy’ukuri mwarashikiwe n’inkuru zibuza ibintu bikuru bikuru
Ubuhizi bukwiye mugabo ituza kuribo ntaco rimaze
Rero ni wirinde nabo, n’umusi azo hamagara uwuzo hamagara kukintu gihambaye cane
Amaso yabo azoba yunamye hasi, bavuye muntatemwa zabo nka kumwe kw’inzige zasanzajwe
Birukira kuri uwo atuza mugihe bavuga abo batemera Imana yabo y’ukuri bati:- uwu musi uragoye cane
